programme.title: Ringing the Changes!
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on the Independence Day celebrations and the Wimbledon finals.
programme.medium_synopsis: Whilst fireworks burn brightly in the sky, Alistair Cooke reflects on the celebrations that take place every 4th of July to commemorate US independence, and the women's finals at Wimbledon.
